game.name: Wizards vs Swamp Creatures
game.description:
Do you think that you are the biggest escaper of your city? If yes, join Wizards Vs Swamp Creatures and get ready to enter the adventure platform where you have to guide your character to escape the attack from his deadly enemies. In this cute and brand new adventure game, you have to play the role of a different character who is expecting his admission letter to the school of wizards. You have to face off different obstacles and hindrances while waiting. 

When you are standing in the queue, a unique idea has come to your mind. You now want to be a magnificent sorcerer while giving yourself a foretaste of your soon-to-be great life. Oh! Get ready to hunt creatures of flabby jelly that you see coming to you in the swamps! No need to be scared of these little vermin as you can protect yourself against them by launching fireballs! Try to stay away from their attacks as you have only 3 lives to lose in each level!

There are three modes and 20 levels to play through in each mode to explore in this html5 war game. One thing is sure that you are not going to get bored for a single minute. In case of seeking a change, you can try out other more popular titles from the category of adventure games for boys that are playable on multiple devices, including desktops, mobile phones and tablets. Good luck to become a champion of an adventure challenge!
